text: <@U044QGKB38E> HubSpot IS THE ONLY APP DEVELOPER THAT CAN USE THIS PIECE OF TECHNOLOGY. If you look at the developer you'll see the HubSpot built those. Frans just said this.
I understand, is it feasible to use v1 of your apis to develop our own synchronization?
No currently it's a "closed piece of technology"
I also would really love this functionality to be able to be used natively by app developers
I understand, thank you very much for your help
Yeah for sure, let me know how you guys decide to work around this issue
